xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka, Kusalattika » 13.14 Niyyānikaduka, Kusalattika » 13.14.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Piṭṭhiduka, Kusalattika
Niyyānikaduka, Kusalattika
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
90.
2566Niyyānikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca niyyāniko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
2567Aniyyānikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
91.
2568Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi…pe…  pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
92.
2569Aniyyānikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2570Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2571(Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
93.
2572Aniyyānikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2573Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2574(Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
